nodes.excerpt: Dang! Got a new laptop and I have to set up everything… again… I always find it exciting when I get something new, such as a new laptop…

frontmatter.title: Setting up a new machine
frontmatter.description: As I became to customise my settings more and more, having to set up a new environment wasn't an exciting thing to do anymore.  I not only have to remember to install all of these things that I need, but it became also tedious and demanded a large cognitive effort.  Also, I got frustrated many times because I thought I was all set up until I realised I forgot to install a particular tool. This post shares some things I've learned when comes to automating my environment setup.
